bibl.title: Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt.
bibl.note: Revised version of a doctoral dissertation, Univ. Göttingen, 2008. - I. Introduction. - II. Christian burial places: 1. General remarks; - 2. Lower Egyptian burial places; - 3. Middle Egyptian burial places; - 4. Upper Egyptian burial places; - 5. The Sinai peninsula; - 6. The oases; - 7. Summary of the results. - III. Christian funerary inscriptions: 1. General remarks; - 2. Dating; - 3. Christian funerary inscriptions in Greek; - 4. Christian funerary inscriptions in Coptic. - IV. Conclusions: 1. Funerary culture; - 2. Tomb structure and architecture; - 3. Funerary stelae. - Appendix: Tables. Selected bibliography.
bibl.seg: Tudor Bianca, Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt.
Marburg, Tectum Verlag, 2011, 8°, xiv-428 pp., tabl., figg., pll. ISBN 978-3-8288-2631-1. €39,90.

Revised version of a doctoral dissertation, Univ. Göttingen, 2008. - I. Introduction. - II. Christian burial places: 1. General remarks; - 2. Lower Egyptian burial places; - 3. Middle Egyptian burial places; - 4. Upper Egyptian burial places; - 5. The Sinai peninsula; - 6. The oases; - 7. Summary of the results. - III. Christian funerary inscriptions: 1. General remarks; - 2. Dating; - 3. Christian funerary inscriptions in Greek; - 4. Christian funerary inscriptions in Coptic. - IV. Conclusions: 1. Funerary culture; - 2. Tomb structure and architecture; - 3. Funerary stelae. - Appendix: Tables. Selected bibliography.
